conbody.p: If a project or the files in its folders contain errors (e.g., incomplete information), Design Studio provides a Problems view pane with detailed information about the error. You can double-click on any item in the list, which will highlight the related element in the Editor area. The application also displays a red x-shaped icon near the element that contains the error. When you hover your cursor over the x-shaped icon, a description of the error is displayed.
You can customize the Problems view pane by sorting the errors and changing the number of errors to display.
